title: Security Threat
comment: My Android security scanner went off as soon as I opened this app.  THIS APP CONTAINS MALWARE/SPYWARE! Anyone with an Android Security app should run a scan on their phone. Btw malware and spyware are not the same as a virus, so if you're app only scans for viruses it won't find other security threats.  I've never had my security app go off since I installed it months ago and I've downloaded a ton of apps since.  No point to keep a risky app if there are a ton of safe alternatives.
